snippet: Assemblyman Rory I. Lancman announced plans to challenge Representative Bob Turner in November, underscoring a belief that the Congressional district will not be eliminated in redistricting.
abstract: New York Assemblyman Rory I Lancman, Democrat, says he plans to challenge Rep Bob Turner, a freshman Republican, for Ninth Congressional District, underscoring a belief that seat, which covers Brooklyn and Queens, will not be eliminated in redistricting.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Rory I. Lancman announced plans to challenge Representative Bob Turner in November, underscoring a belief that the Congressional district will not be eliminated in redistricting.

headline.seo: Rory Lancman to Challenge Bob Turner for Congress
headline.main: Democrat in Bid to Reclaim Weiner’s Seat From G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Democrat in Bid to Reclaim Weiner’s Seat From G.O.P.
